# Migrate project to Next.js and Tailwind CSS (2025-12-03 14:49Z)

_**User (2025-12-03 14:45Z)**_

I want to migrate this whole project to the latest version of nextjs with the app directory.



I want to replace material ui with shadcn/tailwindcss. For now I want to keep the existing functionality, look and feel and structure. I will later add new features or modify existing ones.

---

A few clarifications before creating the migration plan:

1. **Routing structure**: Keep it as a single-page app (all sections on one page), or split into separate routes (e.g., `/about`, `/portfolio`, `/career`)?

2. **Data fetching**: Keep JSON files in `public/data/` and fetch client-side, or move to Next.js API routes or server components?

<tool-use data-tool-type="unknown" data-tool-name="create_plan">
<details>
<summary>Tool use: **create_plan**</summary>


Parameters:

```json
{
  "plan": "# Next.js App Directory Migration with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS\n\n## Overview\nMigrate from Create React App to Next.js 14+ with app directory, replacing Material UI v4 with shadcn/ui components and Tailwind CSS. Preserve all existing functionality, visual design, and structure.\n\n## Current State Analysis\n- **Framework**: Create React App (react-scripts)\n- **UI Library**: Material UI v4 (@material-ui/core, @material-ui/icons, @material-ui/lab)\n- **Styling**: SCSS with Material UI theme system\n- **Structure**: Single-page application with sections (Hero, About, Portfolio, Career, Contact, Footer)\n- **Components**: 38 files using Material UI components\n- **Theme**: Dark theme with blueGrey[900] primary, deepOrange[500] secondary\n- **Fonts**: Titillium Web (primary), Play (secondary), neuropol_nova_cnd (custom)\n\n## Migration Steps\n\n### Phase 1: Next.js Setup and Configuration\n1. **Install Next.js dependencies**\n   - Install Next.js 14+ (latest stable), React 18+, React DOM\n   - Remove react-scripts and CRA-specific dependencies\n   - Update package.json scripts (dev, build, start, lint)\n\n2. **Create Next.js app directory structure**\n   - Create &#96;app/&#96; directory with &#96;layout.jsx&#96; and &#96;page.jsx&#96;\n   - Move &#96;public/&#96; folder (already in correct location)\n   - Create &#96;app/globals.css&#96; for global styles\n\n3. **Configure Next.js**\n   - Create &#96;next.config.js&#96; with appropriate settings\n   - Set up TypeScript config if needed (or keep JavaScript)\n   - Configure image optimization if needed\n\n### Phase 2: Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui Setup\n1. **Install and configure Tailwind CSS**\n   - Install tailwindcss, postcss, autoprefixer\n   - Create &#96;tailwind.config.js&#96; with custom theme matching Material UI theme:\n     - Colors: blueGrey[900] (#263238) as primary, deepOrange[500] (#ff5722) as secondary\n     - Dark background: darken(blueGrey[900], 0.125)\n     - Custom spacing array: [0, 4, 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 50, 64, 80, 128]\n   - Configure custom fonts (Titillium Web, Play, neuropol_nova_cnd)\n   - Set up dark mode\n\n2. **Install and configure shadcn/ui**\n   - Initialize shadcn/ui with &#96;npx shadcn-ui@latest init&#96;\n   - Configure components.json\n   - Install required shadcn components matching Material UI usage:\n     - Button, Dialog, Drawer, Container, Typography equivalents\n     - Icon components (using lucide-react or similar)\n     - Card, Sheet, Separator, etc.\n\n### Phase 3: Component Migration Strategy\n1. **Create component mapping**\n   - Material UI → shadcn/ui equivalents:\n     - &#96;Container&#96; → custom container with Tailwind classes\n     - &#96;Typography&#96; → semantic HTML with Tailwind typography\n     - &#96;AppBar/Toolbar&#96; → shadcn Sheet or custom header\n     - &#96;Dialog&#96; → shadcn Dialog\n     - &#96;Drawer&#96; → shadcn Sheet/Drawer\n     - &#96;Fab&#96; → shadcn Button\n     - &#96;Button&#96; → shadcn Button\n     - &#96;IconButton&#96; → shadcn Button variant\n     - &#96;Link&#96; → Next.js Link or shadcn equivalent\n     - &#96;Divider&#96; → shadcn Separator\n     - Material Icons → lucide-react icons\n\n2. **Migrate core layout components**\n   - &#96;app/layout.jsx&#96;: Root layout with theme provider, fonts, metadata\n   - &#96;app/page.jsx&#96;: Main page component (replaces App.js)\n   - Convert &#96;Main.jsx&#96; structure to app directory page\n\n3. **Migrate components systematically** (preserve functionality)\n   - **Navigation**: AppBar, DesktopAppBar, MobileAppBar, NavBar\n   - **Sections**: HeroBanner, About, Portfolio, Career, Contact, Footer\n   - **UI Components**: Dialog, Drawer, Buttons, Cards, etc.\n   - **Utility Components**: ScrollTop, Logo, SocialLinks, etc.\n\n### Phase 4: Styling Migration\n1. **Convert SCSS to Tailwind**\n   - Convert &#96;App.scss&#96; and &#96;styles/_global.scss&#96; to Tailwind utilities\n   - Migrate &#96;styles/_animations.scss&#96; to Tailwind keyframes\n   - Convert &#96;styles/_hero-banner.scss&#96; to Tailwind classes\n   - Preserve custom animations using Tailwind's animation utilities\n\n2. **Theme preservation**\n   - Map Material UI theme colors to Tailwind config\n   - Preserve typography scale and font families\n   - Maintain spacing system\n   - Keep dark theme appearance\n\n3. **Custom fonts**\n   - Configure Google Fonts (Titillium Web, Play) in Next.js\n   - Set up custom font (neuropol_nova_cnd) via @font-face in globals.css\n   - Apply fonts via Tailwind config\n\n### Phase 5: Functionality Preservation\n1. **Hooks and utilities**\n   - Migrate &#96;hooks/&#96; directory to &#96;app/&#96; or &#96;lib/&#96; structure\n   - Ensure &#96;useResizer&#96;, &#96;useFetchData&#96; work with Next.js\n   - Update data fetching if needed (client vs server components)\n\n2. **Helpers**\n   - Migrate &#96;helpers/&#96; directory\n   - Update any path references for Next.js\n\n3. **Data files**\n   - Keep JSON files in &#96;public/data/&#96; for client-side fetching\n   - Or migrate to server components with direct imports\n\n4. **Animations and interactions**\n   - Preserve scroll-to-top functionality\n   - Maintain smooth scrolling\n   - Keep all animations and transitions\n\n### Phase 6: Cleanup and Optimization\n1. **Remove old dependencies**\n   - Remove Material UI packages\n   - Remove react-scripts\n   - Remove node-sass (if not needed)\n   - Clean up unused dependencies\n\n2. **Update configuration files**\n   - Remove CRA-specific configs\n   - Update .gitignore if needed\n   - Update README with Next.js instructions\n\n3. **Testing**\n   - Verify all sections render correctly\n   - Test responsive behavior\n   - Verify animations and interactions\n   - Check data loading\n\n## Key Files to Modify/Create\n\n### New Files\n- &#96;app/layout.jsx&#96; - Root layout\n- &#96;app/page.jsx&#96; - Main page\n- &#96;app/globals.css&#96; - Global styles with Tailwind\n- &#96;next.config.js&#96; - Next.js configuration\n- &#96;tailwind.config.js&#96; - Tailwind configuration\n- &#96;postcss.config.js&#96; - PostCSS configuration\n- &#96;components.json&#96; - shadcn/ui configuration\n\n### Modified Files\n- &#96;package.json&#96; - Update dependencies and scripts\n- All component files in &#96;src/components/&#96; - Replace Material UI with shadcn/Tailwind\n\n### Files to Remove/Archive\n- &#96;src/App.js&#96; - Replaced by &#96;app/page.jsx&#96;\n- &#96;src/index.js&#96; - Not needed in Next.js\n- &#96;src/App.scss&#96; - Converted to Tailwind\n- &#96;src/styles/materialUiTheme.js&#96; - Replaced by Tailwind config\n- &#96;public/index.html&#96; - Not needed (Next.js generates HTML)\n\n## Considerations\n- Maintain exact visual appearance (colors, spacing, typography)\n- Preserve all animations and transitions\n- Keep responsive breakpoints consistent\n- Ensure accessibility is maintained\n- Preserve SEO metadata structure\n- Keep data fetching patterns working",
```
